briefdescription.para: App-defined callback is invoked when audio is ready.
FreeRTOS ringbuffer is used to send audio to app.
Audio Source (current only AUDADC and PDM are supported)
Invoked by IRQ when audio buffer is ready.

detaileddescription.para: Audio configuration is via this struct, which also serves as a handle after ns_audio_init() has been invoked

briefdescription.para: Start audio capture, must be called after ns_audio_init.
Extract int16 PCM from data collected by ADC.

parameterdescription.para: - number of sample words to convert

briefdescription.para: Extract int16 PCM from AUDADC or PDM sources.
API Definition for NeuralSPOT Audio library.
